attributes.action: Remove Mrs Teresa May as PM immediately.
attributes.background: Failing to look after the best interest of the uk, using unnecessary force against Syria with no evidence. Failing to get the full support of her government and country.  Germany, Spain and others didn't feel the need to be involved ? We can't afford to feed the poor but we can afford to go to war ?

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217290
